# 8.1. Linear correlation


<!-- Linear bivariate relationships.

Correlation coefficients and scatterplots, illustrated with the [OECD Better Life Index](https://github.com/jeromyanglim/oecd_life_analysis/blob/master/oecd-life.md) and [quartile-frame scatterplots](https://github.com/bearloga/Quartile-frame-Scatterplot).

[Scatterplot matrixes](https://gastonsanchez.wordpress.com/2012/08/27/scatterplot-matrices-with-ggplot/). 
http://gettinggeneticsdone.blogspot.com/2011/07/scatterplot-matrices-in-r.html
-->

```{r correlation, eval=FALSE}
# Continuing with QOG data. 
require(arm)
require(car)
require(ggplot2)
require(GGally)

# Extract UNDP data.
qog.x <- qog.d[, grepl("undp_", names(qog.d))]

# Subset to full data.
qog.x <- na.omit(qog.x)

# Correlation matrix.
cor(qog.x)

# Correlation plot (arm).
corrplot(qog.x, color = TRUE)

# Scatterplot matrix (car).
scatterplotMatrix(qog.x, spread=FALSE, lty.smooth=2)

# Scatterplot matrix (GGally).
ggpairs(qog.x)
```
